name: columbine pentagon
notes:
this pattern is inspired by the *red and yellow columbine flower.*
it is an afghan block. can be used as a blanket, cushion cover, throw, table runner or bag.
beautiful textured floral and simple pattern.

crochet terms
us
skill level
experimental beginners and intermediate.
pattern
written instructions and step by step images for every round.
size
20cm x 20cm/8” x 8” (after blocking)
gauge
medium tension
hook size
3.5 mm
yarn
yimian(依棉) milk cotton(依棉), 50gm ball

colourway
colour a - wine red × 1 balls 
colour b - autumn yellow × 1 balls
colour c - watermelon red × 1 balls
colour d - candy corn × 1 balls
colour e - grass green × 1 balls
colour f - ink green × 1 balls



instagram- [@sadika_sobhan][1]
pattern workshop group- [the sky crochet pattern group][2] 
special thanks to all my lovely testers. you made a great and very helpful job. thank you so much.
sadika
